channel.title: RuneMade Development Team
channel.description:
Hello, I'm currently working alone and putting RuneMade together as a very good server, I was thinking about a partner that could help me getting things better. I do not tolerate any untrustable person that's trying to get in the team.
Requirements:
[ul][li]Be "known" on MoparScape or other RS Community Website.[/li] [li]Show some of his/her own work before getting into the team.[/li] [li]Living around timezone GMT +1[/li] [li]Trustable[/li][/ul]
As we've listed the requirements we should now get into the pictures from the server development, I decided to link you to the pictures and more information about the server.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,490397.0.html
Feel free to post there too.
If you wish to get into the development team please to not ask for my msn, just post the requirements bellow or pm me.
~ RuneMade

item.title: RuneMade Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:4, topic:393349”]Do you need a forum developer? If so I’m available.

I’m known threw out the community.
I live in England.
I’m trustworthy and hard working.
I’ve worked for many servers, Loveandpower will be able to vouch for me on this one.[/quote]Vouched.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“get_a_life, post:2, topic:393349”]maybe i can help u. ;D
my msn is: getalife3100@hotmail.com[/quote]Please read the requirements and read the thread again, as I wrote I didn’t want anyone on msn before I get the information about the user bellow as a post or in pm.

item.description:
@RuneMade wrote:

Hello, I’m currently working alone and putting RuneMade together as a very good server, I was thinking about a partner that could help me getting things better. I do not tolerate any untrustable person that’s trying to get in the team.

Requirements:

Feel free to post there too.
